isis.stitle: 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14613 - REASSEMBLE - INTEGRAL OIL PUMP

step1.para: Replace the O-ring on the front case plug. Seat plug in the front case bore with a maul ( Figure 187).

figure.caption: Figure 187. Seat Plug in Front Case Bore

step1.para: Install relief valve in integral oil pump housing as shown ( Figure 188).

figure.caption: Figure 188. Install Relief Valve in Integral Oil Pump Housing

step1.para: Install relief valve spring in the oil pump housing ( Figure 189).

figure.caption: Figure 189. Install Relief Valve Spring in Oil Pump Housing

step1.para: Secure the oil pump housing in a vise. Depress spring in the housing bore and drive the relief valve retention roll pin into the roll pin bore ( Figure 190).

figure.caption: Figure 190. Drive Relief Valve Retention Roll Pin into Roll Pin Bore

step1.para: If removed, replace the drive shaft snap ring on the pump drive shaft and insert the drive shaft through the pump housing bore as shown ( Figure 191).

figure.caption: Figure 191. Insert Drive Shaft Through Pump Housing Bore

step1.para: Install two keys on the drive shaft ( inset, Figure 192), and install the integral oil pump inner element on the drive shaft, aligning keys on the drive shaft with keyways on the inner element.

figure.caption: Figure 192. Install Keys on Drive Shaft and Install Integral Oil Pump Inner Element

note.para: Place the round key in the round keyway; square key in the square keyway.

step1.para: Install the inner element retention snap ring in the drive shaft snap ring groove ( Figure 193).

figure.caption: Figure 193. Install Inner Element Retention Snap Ring

step1.para: Install the drive gear key in the keyway of the drive shaft ( inset, Figure 194). Install the drive gear on the drive shaft, aligning the keyway on the drive gear with the key on the drive shaft.

figure.caption: Figure 194. Install Drive Gear Key in Keyway of Drive Shaft and Install Drive Gear

step1.para: Install outer drive gear retention snap ring in the groove of the drive shaft ( Figure 195).

figure.caption: Figure 195. Install Outer Drive Gear Retention Snap Ring

step1.para: Install the outer integral oil pump element over the inner element ( Figure 196).

figure.caption: Figure 196. Install Outer Integral Oil Pump Element Over Inner Element

step1.para: Install the integral oil pump retainer over the alignment pin inside of the case, bore in the retainer facing the rear of the case ( Figure 197).

figure.caption: Figure 197. Install Integral Oil Pump Retainer Over Alignment Pin

step1.para: Install the integral oil pump assembly in the case, aligning the front face of the oil pump with the retainer and alignment pin ( Figure 198).

figure.caption: Figure 198. Install Integral Oil Pump Assembly

step1.para: Install three bolts and washers through the front of the case and into the pump housing ( Figure 199). Tighten bolts to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N· m).

figure.caption: Figure 199. Install Bolts and Washers into Pump Housing

step1.para: Replace the O-ring on the suction tube and install the tube under the case rib and into the integral oil pump. Bend locktang of the suction tube over the case rib ( Figure 200).

figure.caption: Figure 200. Bend Locktang of Suction Tube Over Case Rib
